Posts.Content: Hi JoDec, Whithards instant teas were my best friend during chemo (and still are now). You can have them either hot or cold! Regular tea and coffee tasted awful during this time but whitards tea I could actually taste. They come in lots of flavours Dreamtimr being my favourite.
Posts.Title: Aversion to liquid! Help!

Posts.Content: Hi A place to buy reasonably priced is Bra.com a colleague from work told me about this place a long time prior to my illness. It has all the beautiful bras at a fraction of the cost and every size possible!
Posts.Title: Post surgery sports bras

Posts.Content: Any of the consultants at the QE hospital Birmingham xx
Posts.Title: Plastic surgeon Birmingham / West Midlands area
